meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>spirit</kanji> of <kanji>approximation</kanji> is the approximation of spirit. My approximation of your spirit? I think you have a <vocabulary>strong spirit</vocabulary>. I think you have <vocabulary>backbone</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
